item.title: SQL in MySQL and Pig Comparision
item.description: Here, it is using Mysql 5.1.x and Pig 0.8 as sample. Two sample files are used as follows. 00.Prepared Files cat /tmp/data_file_1 zhangsan 23 1 lisi 24 1 wangmazi 30 1 meinv 18 0 dama 55 0 cat /tmp/data_file_2 1 a 23 bb 50 ccc 30 dddd 66 eeeee 01.Load Files 1)Mysql (Need to create the table first). CREATE TABLE TMP_TABLE(USER VARCHAR(32),AGE INT,IS_MALE BOOLEAN); CREATE TABLE TMP_TABLE_2(AGE INT,OPTIONS VARCHAR(50)); -- 用于Join LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE '/tmp/data_file_1' INTO TABLE TMP_TABLE ; LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE '/tmp/data_file_2' INTO TABLE TMP_TABLE_2; 2)Pig tmp_table = LOAD '/tmp/data_file_1' USING PigStorage('\t') AS (user:chararray, age:int,is_male:int); tmp_table_2= LOAD '/tmp/data_file_2' USING PigStorage('\t') AS (age:int,options:chararray); 02.
